item.title: Al Ajeets Management and Outsourcing Pvt Ltd
item.description: Ajeets Consultants is Nepal's leading recruitment services provider since 1991. Ajeets Group provides unique value to clients and candidates through a comprehensive suite of innovative solutions which cover an entire range of talent-driven needs from recruitment and assessment, training and development, and career management, to outsourcing and workforce consulting. With our cost effective solutions and customized strategy we make a sense for specific needs and objectives of an organization, Our HR solutions provides an economical way to procure talent to your organization. We specialize in the search and Staffing of top-notch professionals at junior, middle and senior management levels across a broad range of industries including Construction, Engineering, Telecom, Hospitality, FMCG, Banking / Finance, Consumer white goods, IT, Media, Service Sector and other service oriented fields across the Globe. Industry We Serve: • Hospitality Recruitment Services • Oil & Gas Recruitment Service • Civil Recruitment Service • Engineering Recruitment Service • Factory & Manufacturing Recruitment • MEP Recruitment • Refinery & Petrochemical Recruitment Services • Cement Plant Recruitment Service • Marine & Shipyard Recruitment Services • EPC Contracting Recruitment Services • Doctors & Health Care Recruitment Services • Medical Nursing Recruitment Services • Retail & Departmental Recruitment Services • Plastic & Fiber Plant Recruitment Services • Security Service Recruitment Services • Steel Plant Recruitment Services • Marine & Offshore Drilling Recruitment Services • Cruise Liner Recruitment Services • Aluminium & Glass Recruitment Service • Facility Management Recruitment Services • Infrastructure & Construction Recruitment • Catering Recruitment Services • Hotel & Fast Food Chains Recruitment Services • Electrical, Mechanical & Instrumentation Engineering Recruitment • Steel Sector Recruitment • IT & Telecom Recruitment Services • Finance & Banking Recruitment Services • Media & Communication Recruitment Services • Agricultural Recruitment Service • Dairy Farm Recruitment Services

item.title: Al Ajeets Management and Outsourcing Pvt Ltd
item.description:
AJEET’S an Overseas manpower job consultancy in nepal is a rapid paced and fast growing organization rendering services in the fields of Human Resources and Marketing across the Gulf countries, Philippines ,Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and Nepal. We offer our Global Recruitment Services in various nations, which are: Italy, Turkey, Saudi Arabia ,USA, Philippines, Nepal, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Germany, Cyprus,UK,Singapore,Oman,Kuwait,SouthKorea,France,Greece,span,Turky,Lebanon,Cyprus,Japan,China, Malaysia , Dubai , Abudhabi , Sharjah, Qatar, Bahrain and others. Services: • Outsourcing & Management Consultancy • Placement &staffing services • Global recruitment services • Domestic Recruitment Services Industry We Serve: • Hospitality Recruitment Services • Oil & Gas Recruitment Service • Civil Recruitment Service • Engineering Recruitment Service • Factory & Manufacturing Recruitment • MEP Recruitment • Refinery & Petrochemical Recruitment Services • Cement Plant Recruitment Service • Marine & Shipyard Recruitment Services • EPC Contracting Recruitment Services • Doctors & Health Care Recruitment Services • Medical Nursing Recruitment Services • Retail & Departmental Recruitment Services • Plastic & Fiber Plant Recruitment Services • Security Service Recruitment Services • Steel Plant Recruitment Services • Marine & Offshore Drilling Recruitment Services • Cruise Liner Recruitment Services • Aluminium & Glass Recruitment Service • Facility Management Recruitment Services • Infrastructure & Construction Recruitment • Catering Recruitment Services • Hotel & Fast Food Chains Recruitment Services • Electrical, Mechanical & Instrumentation Engineering Recruitment • Steel Sector Recruitment • IT & Telecom Recruitment Services • Finance & Banking Recruitment Services • Media & Communication Recruitment Services • Agricultural Recruitment Service • Dairy Farm Recruitment Services
Special: We are dedicated to deliver our services to our clients within the set time frame and refer them a best suitable candidate as per their job profile. Location: Al Ajeets Management and Outsourcing Pvt Ltd SINAMANGAL-9 SHLESH MANTAK MARG, PANCHAKUMARI MANDIR, KATHMANDU, NEPAL Email : nepal.hrd@ajeets.com 00 977-9813809625 / 00977-9803395899 for more information visit ajeets.com

item.title: Landmark Recruitment Agency
item.description: Landmark Recruitment Agency is well established and powerful manpower agency in Nepal.This company provide all types of manpower from Nepal.Landmark is situated in Samakhusi, Kathmandu Nepal.This company is authorized by government under license no. 762/064/065. Landmark start working officially from 2008. Among all other recruitment agencies landmark represent the best company to recruit Nepalese workers to other countries. When it start there is only few number of employees working but now a days there is more than 100 staffs working.Now a day's landmark recruits workers in different countries and for different catagories, such as professional, skilled, unskilled, labour and so on.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Lal Dhanus International P. Ltd.
item.description: Lal Dhanus conceived and subsequently, incepted in the year 2003. We started with a handful of clients looking for best talent from Nepal to work fir their esteemed organizations. Our spirit of learning and sharing strengthened our placement activities and was instrumental in helping clients to get what they were looking for in the Nepalese market. Today, Lal Dhanus meets manpower requirements of many esteemed organizations including some companies.Our focus is always on the client requirement; to pick the right candidate and our high standards of ethics have helped us in developing long lasting relationships with our clients.
